title: Pixel 3: Intermittently can't play videos on any app, it's like it's stuck on pause
content:
Hello,
I am getting this intermittent issues where I can't play videos on any app (YouTube, Reddit, WhatsApp etc.). The video will load and just show a still image like it's paused, you can pause and unpause but nothing plays. You can scroll through the video and see different still images.

It may happen twice in a day, once in a week, every other day - it's so intermittent and I can't figure out what causes it. The only way to resolve it is to restart the device.

I have done a factory reset twice and I have now only got the bear minimum apps running, no games or anything just the Google apps, social media, Netflix and my banking apps but I still get the issue.
Trying to replicate in safe mode isn't really an option as I can't have my phone running like this for a week and the affected apps would be disabled.

Any ideas on what it could be?

Thanks
